TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: You must be specific, I can't find an option to change it to "Something like...".
"Bilfr3d" - if that's not available, then "B1lfred".

> On 5/24/2015 at 6:51 PM, Endersmens said:
> 
> 
> This is a thread where you can post a request to have your forum username changed to whatever you select. (within reason)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Post on here with your request for a name change, and the new name you want.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **Warning!!!**
> 
> 
> 
> 
> You only get **one** name change! Once you change your name, the new name is permanent, no exceptions. So choose wisely!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I will be monitoring this thread closely and PMing Sal\_vager with any requests to make sure they are all taken care of. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
>
